Member Typedef Documentation

typedef pair<int, int> MapStorage::range_t
 

Range of indices.

First is begin and second is end.

int MapStorage::getCoverage (  const layerImp_t &  imp,
const ParamsNotice &  params,
const MapProjection &  projection,
const TileMapFormatDesc &  mapDesc
)  const
 

Get how much of the area specified by the MapProjection this MapStorage covers.

Full coverage is MAX_INT16, no coverage is zero.

Parameters:
imp The layer and importance.
params The paramsnotice.
projection The map projection.
mapDesc The mapformat description.
Returns:
The coverage value.

Definition at line 177 of file TileMapContainer.h.

map<layerImp_t, range_t> MapStorage::m_importances
 

Map of importances.

The key is the importance, and the values is index range in m_maps and m_params for the importance. I.e. the importance starts at second.first and ends after second.second.

Definition at line 162 of file TileMapContainer.h.
